isNoNav.fieldDescription: On Select no other details except for logo will be displayed in header
isNoNav.name: ./isNoNav

productUnavailableMsg.fieldDescription: This message will be shown when the product is unavailable
productUnavailableMsg.name: ./productUnavailableMsg

productDiscontinuedMsg.fieldDescription: This message will be shown when the product has been discontinued
productDiscontinuedMsg.name: ./productDiscontinuedMsg

icon.fieldDescription: This Icon applies for Mini Cart and Mini Quote
icon.name: ./miniCartIcon

altIcon.fieldDescription: This Alt Text applies for Mini cart and Mini Quote Icon
altIcon.name: ./altIcon

emptyCartIcon.fieldDescription: This Icon applies for Mini Cart and Mini Quote
emptyCartIcon.name: ./emptyCartIcon

emptyCartAnonymousUserDesc.fieldLabel: Empty Mini Cart Anonymous User Description
emptyCartAnonymousUserDesc.name: ./emptyCartAnonymousUserDesc

homePageAlert.fieldDescription: Enabling this will show alert for homepages only.
homePageAlert.name: ./homePageAlert
homePageAlert.text: Show alert message only on home page

scheduleUnpublished.fieldDescription: Schedule Alert Banner Unpublished date and time
scheduleUnpublished.name: ./alertEndDate

msgPopupLabel.fieldDescription: Will be visible in mobiles if the message it big
msgPopupLabel.name: ./msgPopupLabelAlert

startDate.fieldDescription: Select start date and time in description
startDate.name: ./isStartDateTime

endDate.fieldDescription: Select end date and time in description
endDate.name: ./isEndDateTime
